bgDescription: The most basic structure to artificially reproduce or store Remnant frequency. It allows the Casket Sonar to match the frequencies around with the Remnant information within its storage to locate special collectibles.
description: Can be used to activate the Casket Sonar's search and pinpointing functions for special collectibles.
obtainDescription: Can be used to activate the Casket Sonar's search and pinpointing functions for special collectibles.
